rule: If "Unknown" is chosen as the output, it must not signify the word has a recognizable part of speech but misaligns with the provided list, and it must include justification or commentary.
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag, 'NN', which is present in the list of allowed part-of-speech tags defined in the description. The output also conforms to the instruction to return just the tag.
OK
